# Koen van Gilst

> Tech Lead at Rabobank with a background in philosophy and lifelong passion for programming. This website showcases technical articles, side projects, generative art, and photography.

Koen van Gilst is a software tinkerer and web enthusiast who creates beautiful, fun, and educational projects using code. With a diverse background at the intersection of technology and humanity, he combines a philosophy degree with lifelong coding experience. Currently in a technical leadership role, Koen enables teams to innovate with AI while maintaining an active presence in web development through side projects and continuous learning.

## About

- [Homepage](https://koenvangilst.nl/): Introduction and background
- [Blog & Projects](https://koenvangilst.nl/lab): Central hub for technical articles and side projects
- [Photography](https://koenvangilst.nl/photography): Photography portfolio with EXIF data

## Key Projects

- [Generative Art Gallery](https://koenvangilst.nl/lab/gen-art-gallery): Creative coding and generative art showcase
- [Prognosis 2100](https://koenvangilst.nl/lab/prognosis-2100): Interactive climate data visualization
- [Ons Land](https://koenvangilst.nl/lab/ons-land): Dutch land usage visualization
- [CO2 Monitor](https://koenvangilst.nl/lab/co2): Real-time CO2 monitoring project

## Articles

- [Side Projects](https://koenvangilst.nl/lab?q=side-project): Coding experiments and personal projects
- [AI Articles](https://koenvangilst.nl/lab?q=AI): Articles about artificial intelligence
- [All Articles](https://koenvangilst.nl/lab?q=article): Technical writing on web development, React, and more

## Optional

- [RSS Feed](https://koenvangilst.nl/feed.xml): Subscribe to blog posts and photography updates
- [Sitemap](https://koenvangilst.nl/sitemap.xml): Full site structure
